name: 2 Samurai
description:
this is traditional fighting boss game

Control
  • arrow keys - move
  • space - jump
  • a - range attack
  • s - melee attack
  • q - block
  • escape - quit game

Bgm i use :

Ronin by yoitrax | https://soundcloud.com/yoitrax
